title: Design Clean Architecture Layers
description: Given a simple Task Manager app requirement, design the package structure and key classes for each layer following Clean Architecture principles.
hints: Domain layer should have no external dependencies
Repository interface goes in domain, implementation in data
Use cases are optional for simple CRUD
DTOs should map to/from domain entities

testCases.description: Domain models should be pure data classes
testCases.expectedBehavior: No framework imports in domain layer
